item.title: Fred R. Harris, Oklahoma senator on Kerner Commission, dies at 94
item.description: Mr. Harris, a liberal populist, was once considered one of the bright young faces of the Democratic Party. He twice ran for president and chaired the ...

item.title: Sharp elbows and raised voices: Inside Trump’s bumpy transition
item.description: His freewheeling team has returned to the patterns of his first term in office — with shouting matches, expulsions from meetings and name-calling.

item.title: Tracking Trump’s picks for his Cabinet and administration
item.description: Here are the people Donald Trump has picked or is considering to fill his Cabinet and key positions in his administration.

item.title: Trump taps Brooke Rollins for agriculture secretary, rounding out Cabinet picks
